title: Minion Essays
content:
First, Hello this is my first post on this forum. I probably will not contribute too much, but I will be highly grateful for any assistance I receive while on these forums.  
Now, the reason for the post. I was hoping some of you could help me finding essays about Robert Slimbach's Minion typeface. It is not important which version: MM, Cyrillic, or whatever. Thank you.
author: strawberry

comments.content: If you go to Wikipedia, search for "Adobe Originals," and then find Minion Pro you should find a good starting point.
